template_reference.name: squadexts
template_reference.comment: Unsure what the purpose of this is. Does it enable the weapon on the unit they're loaded into? For example a half-track's rear gun is not active until they have units in it?

group.name: state_tree_references
group.comment: State tree that increases the EXPERIENCE that this entity grants to enemies when its dead.

template_reference.name: squadexts
template_reference.comment: Temporarily removing the construction menu from Riflemen for vertical slice. They have teir own construction_riflemen menu which is supposed to look at a player upgrade and display if its present, however, requirements appear to be inconsistently broken.
